page.title: 14Childrens Games
page.content: The children of the Primary school enjoy playing most of the traditional games, especially at parties. There is however a tendency for individual and playground games to be of a more violent kind and to involve mock fights. {Party}games liked, oldest children first, were "pass the parcel " and "musical chairs." {Playground} games were "bulldog" and "cat and mouse." {Outdoor} games were a teasing,chasing and fighting game called "gay boy", and "hide and seek." {Indoor games} were fighting,"hide and seek","dolls"and "snap". The children like playing imaginative games inspired by the latest T.V. programmes or favourite films that they have seen.
